name: Orchidea Jungalow
description: The slightly elevated position of this brand new Jungalow treats you with the most amazing view of the ocean and our wild jungle garden. It has a queen size bed with hand-crafted mosquito net and furniture. Surrounded by a variety of exotic flowers, the elegant simplicity of this Jungalow is the perfect treat for nourishing your body and soul.

name: Margarita Jungalow
description: These two Jungalows allow you to completely immerse yourself within the jungle. Surrounded by the richness of the tropical rainforest you will feel free like a bird, yet snug in its nest. Both cabins are equipped with double beds and hand-crafted mosquito nets to ensure cool breezes while you sleep, no air-conditioning needed. Sliding screen doors create the effect of living in the trees and the hammocks on each balcony with a view of the sea, invite you to laze away the afternoon. A simple yet pure bathroom opens onto the balcony.

name: Rosa Jungalow
description: This small but cozy room with a double bed is the best place to read while enjoying the beautiful view into passionfruit vines and the Caribbean Sea. Thereâ€™s a small decked area outside with a hammock, a perfect little hideaway for a smaller budget.
